textareaPlaceholder.message: Please enter your message and press Enter to send

settingsDomainDescription.message: This is the request domain name of the background service, for example: https://api.openai.com. There is no need to carry the path information behind the main domain name.

settingsApikeyDescription.message: This is the request secret key of the background service, for example: sk-xxxxxx, which needs to be obtained from the background service.

settingsApikeyError.message: Please enter a valid API Key.
